Package sprites

Class EnemyFactory

java.lang.Object
sprites.EnemyFactory
Direct Known Subclasses:
GhostFactory, MageFactory
public abstract class EnemyFactory extends Object
EnemyFactory will be used to create up to five enemy factory classes: Beaver, Ghost, Mage, Necromancer, and Salamander. Extensions of EnemyFactories will load the static images for each of the classes. Testing is found in Enemy.java.

  • Method Details

    • createEnemy

      public abstract Enemy createEnemy(int x, int y)
      A user can create an enemy by calling this method and specifying the starting coordinates of the enemy.
      Parameters:
      x - upper-left x coordinate of the enemy.
      y - upper-left y coordinate of the enemy.
      Returns:
      Enemy the created enemy

    • load_images

      protected abstract void load_images()
      load_images should be implemented separately for each enemy

    • load_spritesheet

      protected void load_spritesheet(String FILE_LOCATION, String character_name, GameVariables.State playerState, int imageNumber, Map<GameVariables.State,List<BufferedImage>> images)
      load_spritesheet should be the same for each enemy.
      Parameters:
      FILE_LOCATION - Location of file
      character_name - Name of character.
      playerState - State of enemy.
      imageNumber - Image number.
      images - Map of images.
